entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EE is failing to locate an enclosing source method for a lambda that captures only `this` in generic type #67247
    Backlog
  • VerifyLocalVariableRename is flaky #67245
  • AlignOpenBraceWithMethodDeclaration is flaky #67244

Closed

  • API proposal for "Using Alias to any Type" #66913
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33509.191 #67248
  • Find and access "referenced project" Compilations and AdditionalDocuments in ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService #67219
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers warns that I should be using version 7.0.0; but there isn't a release version of 7.0.0 yet #65581
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName in IIncrementalGenerator and Generic Attributes #66383
  • StructLayout doesn't work for record structs with DateTime fields #67242

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve EnC test helpers, add repro for #67243 #67252
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
  • Include faulty version number in version format diagnostic #67251
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main into features/CollectionLiterals #67250
    Area-Compilers
  • Compute PatternMatching result in parallel when refreshing completion list #67249
    Area-IDE
  • Add Commit Validation Pipeline #67241
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rebuild fixes #67240
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Skip flaky integration tests #67246
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Warn when taking address of local or parameter in async method #66915
    Area-Compilers
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Primary Constructors - Don't report unused parameters #67167
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Enforce proper shadowing for locals and parameters in EE #67189
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Keep runtime version in sync with VS #67164
    Area-Infrastructure
